fontastic
Class Fontastic

java.lang.Object
  fontastic.Fontastic

public class Fontastic
extends Object

Fontastic A font file writer for Processing. http://code.andreaskoller.com/libraries/fontastic

Method Detail

version

public static String version()
Return the version of the library.

Returns:
String

getFontname

public String getFontname()
Returns the font name.

Returns:
String

buildFont

public void buildFont()
Builds the font and writes the .ttf and the .woff file as well as a HTML template for previewing the WOFF. If debug is set (default is true) then you'll see the .ttf and .woff file name in the console.

cleanup

public void cleanup()
Deletes all the glyph files created by doubletype in your data/fontname folder.

setAuthor

public void setAuthor(String author)
Sets the author of the font.

setCopyrightYear

public void setCopyrightYear(String copyrightYear)
Sets the copyright year of the font.

setVersion

public void setVersion(String version)
Sets the version of the font (default is "0.1").

setFontFamilyName

public void setFontFamilyName(String fontFamilyName)
Sets the font family name of the font. Also called in the constructor. If changed with setFontFamilyName() it won't affect folder the font is stored in.

setSubFamily

public void setSubFamily(String subFamily)
Sets the sub family of the font.

setTypefaceLicense

public void setTypefaceLicense(String typefaceLicense)
Sets the license of the font (default is "CC BY-SA 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/")

setBaseline

public void setBaseline(float baseline)
Sets the baseline of the font.

setMeanline

public void setMeanline(float meanline)
Sets the meanline of the font.

setAdvanceWidth

public void setAdvanceWidth(int advanceWidth)
Sets the advanceWidth of the font. Can be changed for every glyph individually. Won't affect already created glyphs.

setTopSideBearing

public void setTopSideBearing(float topSideBearing)

setBottomSideBearing

public void setBottomSideBearing(float bottomSideBearing)

setAscender

public void setAscender(float ascender)

setDescender

public void setDescender(float descender)

setXHeight

public void setXHeight(float xHeight)

setDefaultMetrics

public void setDefaultMetrics()
Sets the default metrics for the typeface: setTopSideBearing(170); // 2 px setAscender(683); // 8 px setXHeight(424); // 5 px setDescender(171); // 2 px setBottomSideBearing(0); // 0px

setDebug

public void setDebug()
Sets debug to true (in debug mode, the library outputs what happens under the hood).

setDebug

public void setDebug(boolean debug)
Sets the value of debug

Parameters:
debug - true or false

addGlyph

public FGlyph addGlyph(char c)
Add a glyph

Parameters:
c - Character of the glyph.
Returns:
FGlyph that has been created.

addGlyph

public FGlyph addGlyph(char c,
                       FContour contour)
Add a glyph and its one contour

Parameters:
c - Character of the glyph.
FContour - Shape of the glyph as FContour.
Returns:
The glyph FGlyph that has been created. You can use this to store the glyph and add contours afterwards. Alternatively, you can call getGlyph(char c) to retrieve it.

addGlyph

public FGlyph addGlyph(char c,
                       FContour[] contours)
Add a glyph and its contours

Parameters:
c - Character of the glyph.
FContour - [] Shape of the glyph in an array of FContour.
Returns:
The FGlyph that has been created. You can use this to store the glyph and add contours afterwards. Alternatively, you can call getGlyph(char c) to retrieve it.

getGlyph

public FGlyph getGlyph(char c)
Get glyph by character

Parameters:
c - The character of the glyph
Returns:
The glyph

getEngine

public Engine getEngine()
Engine getter

Returns:
The doubletype Engine used for font creation, so that you can access all functions of doubletype in case you need them.

getTypefaceFile

public TypefaceFile getTypefaceFile()
Returns the TypefaceFile

Returns:
The doubletype TypefaceFile used for font creation, so that you can access functions of doubletype in case you need them.

getTTFfilename

public String getTTFfilename()
Returns the .ttf file name

Returns:
The .ttf file name, which is being created when you call build()

getWOFFfilename

public String getWOFFfilename()
Returns the .woff file name

Returns:
The .woff file name, which is being created when you call build()
